# Splitting into training and test data 

```{r}

## 75% of the sample size
smp_size <- floor(0.75 * nrow(cdc_2020))

## set the seed to make your partition reproducible
set.seed(123)
train_ind <- sample(seq_len(nrow(cdc_2020)), size = smp_size)

train_data <- cdc_2020[train_ind, ]
test_data <- cdc_2020[-train_ind, ]



```


# Hospitality - Logistic

```{r}
control <- rfeControl(functions = lmFuncs , # random forest
                      method = "repeatedcv", # repeated cv
                      repeats = 5, # number of repeats
                      verbose = FALSE) # number of folds

head(cdc_2020)

x_train = train_data[,15:66]
y_train = train_data[,7]

result_rfe1 <- rfe(x = x_train, 
                   y = y_train, 
                   sizes = c(1:nrow(x_train)),
                   rfeControl = control)



```
